## WebdriverLike type

Direct reference to a selenium-webdriver [WebDriver](https://www.selenium.dev/selenium/docs/api/javascript/module/selenium-webdriver/index_exports_WebDriver.html) instance, or to an object containing a WebDriver instance as its `driver` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type WebdriverLike = WebDriver | {
    driver: WebDriver;
};
```
